Html:
Kavan,

I notice a problem with the sequencer and Serpent Coil Braid. I'm a 40/0/21 arcane mage and I use Hex Lord and SCB as my trinkets., It tells me to pop SCB during IV and AP, but then a few seconds later it says to use a mana gem. Obviously these events can't occur like that as the mana gem usage is what triggers the SCB cooldown.
